lecturers.name: Andy Huang
lecturers.title: Course/iOS Lead
lecturers.description: Hi! I’m Andy and I’m a third year studying computer science. I spend way too much time on Netflix and watching anime! Feel free to talk to me if you have show recommendations or have questions regarding iOS development!

lecturers.name: Jessica Ng
lecturers.title: Web Lead
lecturers.description: Hi everyone, I’m Jessica, a second-year intended CS major from the Bay Area! You can usually find me reading, crocheting, playing Tetris, or binge-watching trashy reality shows. I'm so excited to be leading Cubstart this semester!

lecturers.name: Juliet Kim
lecturers.title: iOS Lecturer
lecturers.description: Hey! I'm Juliet and I'm a senior studying CS from LA. I love journaling, baking, hitting that 12-3-30, and matcha lemonade <3. Super excited to meet everyone this semester!

tas.name: Abinaya Dinesh
tas.title: iOS TA
tas.description: Hi! I'm Abinaya - a first year double majoring in Data Science and CRS. I'm really interested in climate tech and food systems, and I love croissants, embroidery, journalling, and coding on the weekends!

tas.name: Enya Do
tas.title: iOS TA
tas.description: Hello, I'm Enya! I'm a first year studying computer science. I love digital art/design, consuming ungodly amounts of caffeine in all forms, and cubstart (of course)!

tas.name: Alexander Goldberg
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: I'm a second year CS + Legal Studies major. Ask me about fencing, hiking, cooking, or the circadian rhythms of malaria parasites.

tas.name: Bryan Chu
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: Hi! I’m a junior studying CS from Saratoga, California. In my free time, I like to be active and exercise as well as binge k-dramas. I’m also a big Warriors and 49ers fan. Feel free to reach out to me about anything!

tas.name: Nick Jiang
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: Hello! I’m a second year CS and philosophy student passionate about building high-impact products. I love biking, reading, and talking with people in all places and times!

tas.name: Pratyush Sharma
tas.title: Web TA
tas.description: Hello, my name is Pratyush, I am a third year student majoring in Computer Science. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions about the course!
